overview: Audrey Grace: A hot day by the pool gets her juices flowing. Too bad her husband isn't around. Amia Miley: This is the type of wife a husband needs to keep busy. Bailey Brooke: When's the last time she put her husband's balls in her mouth? Nina North: When this slutty wife wants dick, she knows just how to get it!
tagline: The ring on her finger does nothing to help keep her legs closed.
title: A Married Woman 3
